title: Rapoo Mens Lightweight Hiking Pants Quick Dry Stretch Joggers for Running Workout Casual
description: 4-Way Stretch Running Pants --- Quick dry, breathable, lightweight, 4-way stretch fabric and comfortable tailored fit, durable enough to do any sports and casual wear.

Quick Dry Sweat Pants --- Rapoo athletic pants for men are made from the quick dry fabric designed to remove moisture from your body, provides lightweight comfort along with sweat absorption and drying capabilities.
Adjustable Waist --- Full elastic waist with drawstring closure for an adjustable fit, allow pants to fit comfortably on any gym sports.

Zipper Pockets --- Two large front security zipper pockets and invisible back pockets can hold 5.5 inch phones, change, keys, etc during active. Premium closed zipper can better protect your valuables not easy to lose.

Applicable Occasions --- Outdoor and sports activities like running, hiking, workout, camping, athletic, fitness, cycling, fishing, gym, track, climbing, travelling, golf, walking, jogging or daily wear, etc.
